permissions.notes: NOTE: each URI must be followed by a permission which is either 'read' or 'readWrite'.
NOTE: each URI must be followed by a permission which is either 'read' or 'readWrite'.
NOTE: each URI must be followed by a permission which is either 'read' or 'readWrite'. For the basic rest role, only read is allowed.

NOTE: each URI must be followed by a permission which is either 'read' or 'readWrite'. For this username, readWrite is allowed. This username - when configured as a 'rest' role username - primarly adds writing to '_manual' and '_override' to the basic permissions of the rest role.
NOTE: each URI must be followed by a permission which is either 'read' or 'readWrite'. NOTE: '/storage/storage/inspector/' must keep the slash at the end, unlike the other uris
